title: Thanks Riot....
body: So with this new client they have the same problem they have had for 5-6 years at least which is the client randomly being a piece of shit when joining a game and never launching the actual game and never connecting to the load screen but O thats my fault that riot cant make a good client so now im on a penalty for leaverbuster for my client not connecting twice in a row both times the teams understood but not riot gotta love this company.

replies.body:
These sorts of issues are commonly caused by something (usually a network configuration) blocking your connection to our gameservers. I strongly recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address the typical culprits of these kinds of issues.

Let me know if this caused any change.
